Class MatchableCollection

java.lang.Object
  ie.ucd.clops.runtime.options.MatchableCollection
Direct Known Subclasses:
OptionGroup, OptionStore
public class MatchableCollection
extends java.lang.Object

A class maintaining a collecgtion of IMatchable objects and implementing their retrieval.

Author:
Mikolas Janota

Method Detail

add

protected void add(IMatchable m)
Add a IMatchable object. An object must be added at most once.

getMatchingOption

public Option<?> getMatchingOption(java.lang.String argString,
                                   int index)
Obtain an Option associated with the given String. If assertForDuplicates then assertion is triggered if more than one Option matched. the option had to be added via add(ie.ucd.clops.runtime.options.IMatchable)
